name: A Tale of Eggs and Pigs (Kat) (Kat)
name_original: A Tale of Eggs and Pigs (Kat) (Kat)
description:
Welcome to Ananas Island! 

Hailey is on a mission: She wants to bake a cake for her grandmother's birthday! All she needs is one special ingredient. Can you help her find it?

A Tale of Eggs and Pigs is a short fantasy-themed adventure game. It was originally made for the RPG Maker MZ "You Got It, Now Use It!" Game Jam hosted by Studio Blue. The current build is the updated and final version of the game. 

Enjoy!
